subject: Inviting suggestions/ comments of State Authorities while finalizing the DPRs.
text: Rd4 7Tcfl4 <THT grfar<o 344 /Phone: 91-11-25074100/25074200 47 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 (@a 4a67, #3r 4Rar7 &r TToar +i7.4) Q; /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) Tl-5 Qf 6, #qer-10, ETGT, 7 faotit-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10; Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.7i041/218/2007-Admn 3rd March 2008 POLICY MATTERS: TECHNICAL (9/2008) [Decision taken on Admn Division'$ F.No.1 1041/235/2007-Admn:] Sub: Inviting suggestions/comments of State Authorities while finalizing the DPRs: It has been observed that there is no formal  arrangement for involving State Authorities in finalization of DPRs: This leads to a situation where objections are raised by the AUthorities during the implementation of the work: 2. In view of the above, it has been decided that prior to finalization of DPRs,  participation of State Authorities should be ensured in order to incorporate their views/comments in the project preparation: Accordingly, following actions are to be taken by the concerned Technical Divisions: (6 At the time of finalization of DPR, the concerned Chief Engineer of the National   Highway Division of the State may be  invited to participate in the discussion: m) Prior to sending proposals to Government, the concerned Nodal Officer of the State may also be invited for discussion: A copy of the DPR may also be made available to the Nodal Officer: 3. This issues with the approval of the Competent Authority- 03 (V.K. Sharmha) General Manager (Admn:) All Officers at Hqs. All PIUs/CMUs 777 NHAL
